amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand the covered customer definition to all small businesses so long as their annual revenue does not exceed $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 113-283 to expand covered customer definition to all small businesses so long as their annual revenue does not exceed $25 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 266 (Roll no. 626).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
